discussion.p: What is ISO/IEC 1990:9899/DAM 1? My guess is that's a typo for ISO/IEC 9899/Amd.1:1995 which I'd have expected to be referenced here (the tables make reference to things which were introduced by Amd.1).
One need probably a reference to the document which introduce char16_t and char32_t in C (ISO/IEC TR 19769:2004?).
Create issue. Document in question should be C99, not C90+amendment1. The rest of the section requires careful review for completeness. Example <cstdint> . Assign to C liasons.
